title: The 6 Human Needs Test
subtitle: Every statement must be answered as: “No,” “Partly,” or “Yes.” Honestly grade each statement: “Yes,” for “yes, this is really me.” “Partly” for this is partly how I am,” and “No” for “This is probably not how I am.” (If you don’t know whether it applies, it’s usually best to check “no.”)

results.title: Here is the Interpretation of your answers
results.subtitle: Your needs (higher means influences your life decisions more):
